##### Q1. Creating function to estimate `w`


```{r}
get_w_tilde_hat <- function(data) {
  w_tilde_hat <- ( var(data$x) - cov(data$x, data$y)) /
  (var(data$x) + var(data$y) - 2 * cov(data$x, data$y))

  w_tilde_hat
} 
```
##### Q2. Function to get a single bootstap sample


```{r}
get_BS_sample <- function(x) {
  x[sample(seq_along(x), length(x), replace = T)]
} 
```
